participants.title: Monograph
participants.description: Conceived at Seven on Seven 2014, and now a thriving start-up in residence at the New Museum’s NEW INC incubator, Monegraph works to solve the issues that surround ownership and monetary support of digital artworks. Anil Dash (Co-founder, ThinkUP) and artist Kevin McCoy created an application that attributes a “digital deed” to a piece of digital art, using a blockchain in a Bitcoin-like system.  This deed authenticates the artworks as original, which can then be sold to a collector, while not limiting its circulation online. Monegraph hopes to influence the way digital artists are able to monetize their work, ultimately making their artistic practices more sustainable.
